data.name: Suck It
data.description:
Suck It! is the ultimate intergalactic vacuum simulator. Suck up coins, bananas, the cat, the sofa‚Ä¶ level up to grow as big as a house! Capture stars and head to the teleporter to claim your win! Fire the contents of your canister at anyone who gets in your way.

As a valued employee of S.U.C.K. (Superstellar Universal Cleaning Korp), you‚Äôve been equipped with the latest high-tech vacuum. This top-of-the-line tech collects anything that fits; empty your haul into the closest Dumpy, and you‚Äôll continue growing in level and size. Don‚Äôt forget the best perk of the job: Jet Packs! These super-powered packs will let you reach heights and escape rival employees!

With easy-to-learn gameplay and high replayability, "Suck It!" is perfect for players of all skill levels.

Suck It! features:


‚≠ê Treasure Hunt Mode: Suck up items around you to fill your canister. When your canister is full, head to a Dumpy who is ready to level you up. Collect 10 stars and head to the beachside teleporter platform to secure your win. Watch out for other players; use your jet pack boosters or fire back to try and steal their stars!

‚≠ê 4 unique avatars: Shark, Cat, Ducky, and Basic Bot

‚≠ê 6 unique vacuums

Coming soon:

‚≠ê Zen Mode: Suck up items, give them to Dumpy, grow as big as possible. Perfect for the pacifist playstyle.

‚≠ê More maps!

‚≠ê More game modes!

‚≠ê More avatars and vacuums!

This game is still navigating the beta quadrant; please share any feedback, issues, and ideas at help.forevrgames.com.

changelog.change_log:
Suck It! is the ultimate intergalactic vacuum simulator. Suck up crackers, bananas, the cat, the sofa‚Ä¶ level up to grow as big as a house! 

This game is still navigating the beta quadrant; please share any feedback, issues, and ideas at ForeVR Games Help Center or @forevrgames on social!

WHAT‚ÄôS NEW
üóëÔ∏è Zen Mode Single Player: Suck, deposit, and grow by yourself without bots
üóëÔ∏è Growth Race: Largest player wins after 5m with friends or bots
üóëÔ∏è Deathmatch: First player to 20 kills wins after 7m with friends or bots
üóëÔ∏è Starlight Shores: New location to play in!
üóëÔ∏è New FTUE before Lobby: Learn how to move, suck, grow, and win!
üóëÔ∏è Continuous Play! No need to return to lobby between matches
üóëÔ∏è Muting and Blocking: Mute chatty players and block trolls
üóëÔ∏è New Avatars, vacuums, Nameplates, and Titles
üóëÔ∏è New holiday content to suck up in the lobby!

IMPROVEMENTS
üóëÔ∏è Fixed bugs

KNOWN ISSUES
üóëÔ∏è [Multiplayer] When the Host returns to the lobby, the clients also return
üóëÔ∏è Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

Suck It! is the ultimate intergalactic vacuum simulator. Suck up coins, bananas, the cat, the sofa‚Ä¶ level up to grow as big as a house! Capture stars and head to the teleporter to claim your win! Fire the contents of your canister at anyone who gets in your way.

This game is still navigating the beta quadrant; please share any feedback, issues, and ideas at ForeVR Games Help Center  or @forevrgames on social!

Build 1.0.1.207 adds cross platform compatibility so steam and oculus users can matchmake together.   

Additions / Improvements:
* Streamer and social media specific skins.
* Nomobot added for developer usage.
* Improved store performance.
* Cross platform compatibility!  Oculus users can now play with Steam users.

Bug fixes:
* Missing nameplates / background images for bots.
* Confirm lobby dialog button was not working on one side of the button. 
* Missing Avatars for users who set a handedness but not a skin.
